Html:
As title says.. I want to use the Dark theme, and i dont want the user to change it, so i am not using the settings as in the example program. BUt if you look at the settings, i would like to use the 2nd color http://puu.sh/8AGMN.png
how can i achieve this?

You need to change

AccentColor

from Assets/ModernUI.xaml

Thanks
